page.title: 04Acknowledgements
page.content:
This information was collected by the members of Davidson's Mains Women's Rural Institute with the assistance of the Royal Society for the Protection of Birds, for whose help we are grateful.
We should also like to acknowledge the assistance of the Forth Ports Authority who offered to take us to the island in one of their ships. However, the correct combination of weather, tide, vessels and members has not been forth coming to date (24th November, 1985) since our involvement in the project.
